CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 5, 1966, pg. 1B reads: "Dynamic Danettes - Members of the Dynamic Danettes have the distinction of being the only social club in which everyone is a life member of the NAACP. The group has contributed $5,000 to the civil rights organization.  This picture was taken at the club's annual Mardi Gras Ball.  Left to right: Betty Culberson, Betty Littleton, Gladys C. Brown, secretary; Margaret Nelson, Clozelle Peterson, president; Ida Jones, founder and social chairman; Foy A. Deveraux, Alma Fox and Alma Cook. (All ["] Teenie" Harris Photos.)"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of nine members of the Danettes, from left: Betty Culberson, Betty Littleton, Gladys C. Brown, Margaret Nelson, Clozelle Peterson, Ida Jones, Foy A. Deveraux, Alma Speed Fox, and Alma Cook, posed in Roosevelt Hotel for Mardi Gras ball, another version
